name: 1-DC
description:
--------------------

Alright, Mr. Thade. You're here for your wife, I'm here for a good, efficient programmer. Do we have an understanding?

--------------------

--------------------

  • Program using only 3 commands.
  • Solve and optimize 32 Tasks and 16 Extra Tasks.
  • Find out more details about your wife.
  • Regret that incident long, long ago.

--------------------

--------------------

I'll be honest with you, Mr. Thade. I'm a just man; I only punish those who deserve to be punished.
And you're one of them.

--------------------

--------------------

1-DC is the third installment of the "N-digit computer" saga, after The 6-digit computer and 1000-BIT. It's aimed to be as accessible and minimalist as possible.

--------------------

--------------------

You can listen to the OST here: https://89odev.bandcamp.com/album/1-dc-ost
